name: In Practise
slogan: Bringing practical insight into business schools at scale
description:
We produce short form video content for business education. Think Netflix for business schools. 

We interview senior executives to package and sell subscriptions to business schools.

jobs.title: Junior analysts for edtech startup
jobs.description:
Two founders, who are former investment analysts, are looking for curious and driven interns to help disrupt higher business education. 

www.inpractise.com

Job details

Sourcing, communicating, scheduling , and meeting with senior executives
Helping the business where needed

Characteristics:

Hungry and driven
Independent

What you will receive:

Learning: an understanding of the MBA curriculum, various industries and businesses and how professors deliver core business concepts
Coaching: on how to communicate with senior business executives
Unique experience and high level of responsibility immediately
